name: Making Muah Chee with Shiny ✨
description:
Special thanks to Shiny Phua and Ah Mah's Legacy 💖

  • AhMah's Legacy (@ahmahslegacy)

Cravings after making muah chee?

Visit the Ah Mah's Legacy store to order some delicious kueh and muah chee made by Shiny herself! They’re really very good 🤤 

---

Controls

  • Mouse
  • Hold or Click Left Mouse Button

---

Developed for Heritage Game Jam 2022.

1. How is this game relevant to the theme? 

The game explores renewal by telling Shiny's story of renewing traditions she took on from her ah mah as players engage in the traditional muah chee making.

2. What sort of experience/message are you hoping your game will bring across to the player?

To be a little more conscious of our relationship with traditions, how are we engaging with them (if at all), and a perspective on how traditions can transform with each generation.

3. Why did you end up choosing the direction of  your game?

I found the idea of collaborating with someone outside the game industry very appealing. I also like the idea of the muah chee making mechanics relating directly to the voice clips being shared and adding that layer of resonance to the story. I'm also just hyped to feature a local business. I tried Shiny's muah chee once and it was damn good, you can really taste the shallot oil 🤤
